prompt_base: raw photo, energetic young woman, martial arts uniform, protective headband, long braided hair, padded sparring gloves, athletic physique, expressive eyes
feature_prompt: natural skin texture, cotton fabric weave, leather glove texture, realistic hair strands, flyaways, soft natural lighting, 8k uhd, sharp focus, 50mm portrait lens
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, 3d render, plastic, doll, wax figure, smooth skin, heavy makeup, airbrushed, distorted, lowres, fake hair
